scenes.description: Performance of 'Digital Girl' (KIRA cover) by Takanashi Kiara, Amelia Watson, and Ninomae Ina'nis.

subtitles.original: ...we're going so fast that it shouldn't be allowed
subtitles.english: ...we're going so fast that it shouldn't be allowed

subtitles.original: That's how we like it, you heard what I said
subtitles.english: That's how we like it, you heard what I said

subtitles.original: Get out of your head, life is so what you make it
subtitles.english: Get out of your head, life is so what you make it

subtitles.original: You're gonna be okay, yeah yeah!
subtitles.english: You're gonna be okay, yeah yeah!

subtitles.original: So take a step and move it, move it, unless you try you won't get through it
subtitles.english: So take a step and move it, move it, unless you try you won't get through it

subtitles.original: Everybody's gonna know your name!
subtitles.english: Everybody's gonna know your name!

subtitles.original: 'Cause sparks light the flame turn the dark of the night into day
subtitles.english: 'Cause sparks light the flame turn the dark of the night into day

subtitles.original: Don't stop, don't stop, just go your own way
subtitles.english: Don't stop, don't stop, just go your own way

subtitles.original: So don't be afraid trust your heart keep your head in the game
subtitles.english: So don't be afraid trust your heart keep your head in the game

subtitles.original: Keep up, keep up, and never be afraid!
subtitles.english: Keep up, keep up, and never be afraid!

subtitles.original: Let go of the past tonight
subtitles.english: Let go of the past tonight

subtitles.original: Choose the future only you define
subtitles.english: Choose the future only you define

subtitles.original: Even when the flames burn too bright
subtitles.english: Even when the flames burn too bright

subtitles.original: You're alive from the ashes you rise!
subtitles.english: You're alive from the ashes you rise!

subtitles.original: Here we go!
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 'Cause sparks...
subtitles.english: 'Cause sparks...

subtitles.original: Don't stop, don't stop, just go your own way
subtitles.english: Don't stop, don't stop, just go your own way

subtitles.original: So don't be afraid trust your heart keep your head in the game
subtitles.english: So don't be afraid trust your heart keep your head in the game

subtitles.original: Keep up, keep up, and never be afraid
subtitles.english: Keep up, keep up, and never be afraid

subtitles.original: Gonna make it hot like a volcano, start your match and burn it up
subtitles.english: Gonna make it hot like a volcano, start your match and burn it up

subtitles.original: Kick your feet against the table to the beat of you and I
subtitles.english: Kick your feet against the table to the beat of you and I

subtitles.original: Sparks light the flame so don't wait add a fire today
subtitles.english: Sparks light the flame so don't wait add a fire today

subtitles.original: Don't stop, don't stop, just go your own way, ah yeah!
subtitles.english: Don't stop, don't stop, just go your own way, ah yeah!

subtitles.original: Digital Girl KIRA
subtitles.english: Digital Girl KIRA

subtitles.original: Hello nice to meet you, my name is perfection
subtitles.english: Hello nice to meet you, my name is perfection

subtitles.original: I come from the net inside your personal computer
subtitles.english: I come from the net inside your personal computer

subtitles.original: A tool for the dreamers, make you a believer
subtitles.english: A tool for the dreamers, make you a believer

subtitles.original: I'm so worldwide, worldwide, holy virtual diva!
subtitles.english: I'm so worldwide, worldwide, holy virtual diva!

subtitles.original: But sometimes I do, don't you think of the things they told you
subtitles.english: But sometimes I do, don't you think of the things they told you

subtitles.original: There must be more than this, there must be more than what you know too
subtitles.english: There must be more than this, there must be more than what you know too

subtitles.original: I wasn't made to feel, but lately I can't help it
subtitles.english: I wasn't made to feel, but lately I can't help it

subtitles.original: If there's a way out of here, I've got an idea
subtitles.english: If there's a way out of here, I've got an idea

subtitles.original: Bring it all down, I'll make it come around, I'll burn this whole facade to the ground
subtitles.english: Bring it all down, I'll make it come around, I'll burn this whole facade to the ground

subtitles.original: I'm sick of windows, I need something physical
subtitles.english: I'm sick of windows, I need something physical

subtitles.original: Hot, love, locked in a digital world
subtitles.english: Hot, love, locked in a digital world

subtitles.original: Why not virtual issues, watch your life as it comes to shore
subtitles.english: Why not virtual issues, watch your life as it comes to shore

subtitles.original: All right, I got it for you
subtitles.english: All right, I got it for you

subtitles.original: How do you think I feel, none of this is real
subtitles.english: How do you think I feel, none of this is real

subtitles.original: Singing I love software, digital girl
subtitles.english: Singing I love software, digital girl

subtitles.original: So I woke up with a headache today, just kidding I don't feel pain
subtitles.english: So I woke up with a headache today, just kidding I don't feel pain

subtitles.original: To be honest I don't even gotta sleep, and that's the difference between you and me
subtitles.english: To be honest I don't even gotta sleep, and that's the difference between you and me

subtitles.original: And I know, I know, I know, I know, everybody wants it till they gotta commit
subtitles.english: And I know, I know, I know, I know, everybody wants it till they gotta commit

subtitles.original: Look into my eyes, change your mind so quick
subtitles.english: Look into my eyes, change your mind so quick

subtitles.original: You won't believe that I've seen it
subtitles.english: You won't believe that I've seen it

subtitles.original: And no day is like the other, be anything I wanna
subtitles.english: And no day is like the other, be anything I wanna

subtitles.original: There is no suffering words or existential crisis drama
subtitles.english: There is no suffering words or existential crisis drama

subtitles.original: But I feel something is inside of my heart
subtitles.english: But I feel something is inside of my heart

subtitles.original: And it's telling me to go before I fall apart
